prov:entity.attribute:description: This recipe evaluates the equilibrium climate sensitivity (ECS) and the transient climate response (TCR) for various CMIP generations.

prov:entity.attribute:caption: Scatterplot between TOA radiance and global mean surface temperature anomaly for 150 years of the abrupt 4x CO2 experiment including linear regression to calculate ECS for bcc-csm1-1 (CMIP5).
